item.description:
THIS EVENT IS "CLOSED " TO NEW PEOPLE. EMAIL TOM LANE IF YOU HAVE ANY QUESTIONS.

UPDATE - $20 for kayak rental is now available, please reserve and pay if you need a boat.

Reservations for the kayak should be made by calling
Saco Canoe Rentals - 603 447 2737
Ask for "peter" and let him know that you are part of the "Wedeln" group so you can get the discount.

UPDATE - This event will close to new people on 6/10. All cancellations should also be made by 6/10 - late cancellations will be required to pay $20 + kayak rental cost.

Have you ever wanted to whitewater kayak? This is the perfect weekend for your first time whitewater experience. We will run the NH section of the Saco River. Guide/Instructors will be Wedeln members with kayak instruction experience.

The day will start with some basic paddling and safety instruction, progress to some kayak games to work on skills, then we head down some Class I and Class II rapids. There will be long stretches of flat water between rapids - this will create an easy pace to work on your technique in slow water.

This is a whitewater trip designed to teach basic whitewater skills - not a party trip or a float trip. Trip leader may limit participation or require portages around some obstacles based on water level and ability.

What to Bring: lunch, water, dry bag with warm clothes. No cotton - dress to get wet!

How to sign up: email Tom Lane (tom_lane@harvard.edu) AND add your name to the meetup event.

What are the costs? No cost for the actual instruction! Guests pay $40 for weekend accommodation. If you do not have a boat Tom has arranged $20 deal through a local outfitter - If you would like to rent a boat please check this meetup later for details. Bring your own lunch and snacks. We may pitch in for dinner but this will be optional.

If you have your own kayak (any type) bring it. If you can get a whitewater boat that is the best BUT this trip will be OK for recreational, sea and sit-on-top kayaks. Please note: The rental kayaks are not true whitewater boats anyway.

Expected instructors include: Rick, Tom, Heidi, Matt, Artemis
item.how_to_find_us: Please come up the Friday night before the event. We will gather at the bar at
item.name: Learn to Kayak Weekend I
